vega.graph.edge
Class DirectedEdge

java.lang.Object
  vega.graph.edge.AbstractEdge
      vega.graph.edge.DirectedEdge
All Implemented Interfaces:
DirectedEdge, Edge
public class DirectedEdge
extends AbstractEdge
implements DirectedEdge

A directed edge is an edge that has a source vertex and a destination vertex. This prevents bi-directional movement by an algorithm on the edge. The visibility of a vertex from one to another is limited by whether it has the opposite vertex as a destination of one of its edges.

Author:
Weston Jossey
